about_the_game:
Note: This game is not currently a complete version. Updates will follow. The current version is v0.5.

Can play levels 1-9

There is a link to Discord on the right panel.

In the game, players will play the role of the head of an alchemy attic. Defeat the female cultivators and turn them into your own fighting force.

Of course, you can also interact with the female characters in the game, such as the boss lady selling goods in the countryside, the female cultivators in Dongshan, and the girls from foreign countries...

You inherited the alchemy room left by your old and confused master.

Ordinary elixirs cannot be synthesized with conventional materials, but the master told you some clues.

Why is there a pig farm in an alchemy pavilion in the mountains?

Why do women in Dongshan disappear frequently?

It's up to you to explore all this.

【Character Introduction】

[Qionghua]

A female monk from Dongshan, the gatekeeper at the checkpoint.

[Yun Shu]

A female cultivator from Dongshan, she is considered a senior sister in Dongshan. She has many junior sisters under her.

[Jinglan]

A member of the Dongshan sect's cabinet, whose strength cannot be ignored in Dongshan.

[Jingshu]

The boss lady of a rural market, why would such a beautiful woman sell goods in the countryside?

Since there are so many characters, I cannot introduce them one by one.

【Gameplay】

The game adopts the form of RPG battle, and the game is played in a turn-based system.

In the process of the game, the enemies you defeat will be transformed into your own [combat power] in the form of [alternative]

In the game, you can also grow vegetables and refine pills to improve your combat power.

You will defeat the last female devil in Dongshan
